project_descr: Return to the Rule of Law and Promotion of Human Rights

outputs.output_descr:
"1. Rule of law reinforced and human rights promoted through upgrading of facilities and revision of curriculum of the Iraq Judicial Training Institute.  Access to justice enhanced through organization of needs assessment survey to identify scope of work as well as prioritizing the target groups.  
2. Capacity of CSOs on human rights and management skills increased through training of 30 trainers and 225 members of CSOs across the country.  
3. Understanding of human rights promoted and CSOs networks in place through the organization of 4 workshops. Awareness raised also through the development, production and distribution of human rights promotional and training materials.
"

project_title: return to rule and low and promotion of human rights
